name: Solar-Powered Engineer Pistol
raw: Step 1: Solar-Powered Pistol Jump to step 2 if you already have a Start Up Pistol. ------------------------------ Ingredients ------------------------------ #L "Basic Calculator" "156058" #L "Auto Targeting Computer -IIR 4 -Ultra-" "137291" #L "Jandawit Cleanup Cluster" "137281" #L "Irreparable River MV" "123667" ------------------------------ Recipe ------------------------------ Auto Targeting Computer -IIR 4 -Ultra- + Basic Calculator = #L "Solar-Powered Weapon Supervisor" "164523" Skills: | WS | ------------------------------ Jandawit Cleanup Cluster + Solar-Powered Weapon Supervisor = #L "Solar-Powered Weapon Device" "164525" Skills: | WS | ------------------------------ Solar-Powered Weapon Device + Irreparable River MV = #L "Solar-Powered Pistol" "121567" Skills: | WS | ------------------------------ Step 2: Solar-Powered Tinker Pistol ------------------------------ Ingredients ------------------------------ #L "Jensen Personal Ore Extractor" "150281" #L "Screwdriver" "150922" #L "Robotic Self-Preservation System" "164529" #L "Notum Chip" "136623" or #L "Notum Fragment" "136625" ------------------------------ Recipe ------------------------------ Screwdriver + Jensen Personal Ore Extractor = #L "Modified Jensen Ore Extractor" "164527" Skills: | WS | ------------------------------ Robotic Self-Preservation System + Modified Jensen Ore Extractor = #L "Unstable Preservation System" "164531" Skills: | WS | ------------------------------ Notum + Unstable Preservation System = #L "Stable Preservation System" "164536" Skills: | WS | ------------------------------ Stable Preservation System + Solar-Powered Pistol = #L "Solar-Powered Tinker Pistol" "164490" Skills: | WS | ------------------------------ Step 3: Solar-Powered Mender Pistol Increase the QL of your pistol to 39 by right-clicking on it. ------------------------------ Ingredients ------------------------------ Mechanical Analyzer (#L "recipe" "/tell recipe 67") ------------------------------ Recipe ------------------------------ Mechanical Analyzer + Solar-Powered Tinker Pistol = #L "Solar-Powered Mender Pistol" "164498" Skills: | WS | ------------------------------ Step 4: Solar-Powered Mechanic Pistol Increase the QL of your pistol to 99 by right-clicking on it. ------------------------------ Ingredients ------------------------------ #L "Electrical Engineering Tutoring Device" "55693" #L "Hacker Tool" "87814" #L "Disposal Unit Electrical Toolset" "164552" ------------------------------ Recipe ------------------------------ Hacker Tool + Electrical Engineering Tutoring Device = #L "Hacked Electrical Engineering Tutoring Device" "164550" Skills: | WS | ------------------------------ Hacked Electrical Engineering Tutoring Device + Disposal Unit Electrical Toolset = #L "Modified Electrical Toolset" "164553" Skills: | WS | ------------------------------ Modified Electrical Toolset + Solar-Powered Mender Pistol = #L "Solar-Powered Mechanic Pistol" "164501" Skills: | WS | ------------------------------ Step 5: Solar-Powered Machinist Pistol Increase the QL of your pistol to 139 by right-clicking on it. ------------------------------ Ingredients ------------------------------ Notum Threaded Backpack (#L "recipe" "/tell recipe 78") ------------------------------ Recipe ------------------------------ Notum Threaded Backpack + Solar-Powered Mechanic Pistol = #L "Solar-Powered Machinist Pistol" "164511" Skills: | WS | ------------------------------ Step 6: Solar-Powered Engineer Pistol Increase the QL of your pistol to 179 by right-clicking on it. ------------------------------ Ingredients ------------------------------ #L "Experimental Nanobot Classifying Computer" "164568" #L "Mist-Filled Jar" "164566" ------------------------------ Recipe ------------------------------ Experimental Nanobot Classifying Computer + Mist-Filled Jar = #L "Energized Nanobot Transmitter" "164574" Skills: | WS | ------------------------------ Energized Nanobot Transmitter + Solar-Powered Machinist Pistol = #L "Solar-Powered Engineer Pistol" "164513" Skills: | WS | ------------------------------ Step 7: Solar-Powered Master Engineer Pistol Increase the QL of your pistol to 199 by right-clicking on it. ------------------------------ Ingredients ------------------------------ #L "Accelerated NCU" "164608" ( #L "recipe" "/tell recipe 1" ) #L "Crystalized Medusa Queen Hippocampus" "164598" ------------------------------ Recipe ------------------------------ Accelerated NCU + Crystalized MedusaQueen Hippocampus = #L "Symbiotic NCU" "164620" Skills: | WS | ------------------------------ Symbiotic NCU + Solar-Powered Engineer Pistol = #L "Solar-Powered Master Engineer Pistol" "164515" Skills: | WS | ------------------------------ Step 8: Infused Solar-Powered Master Engineer Pistol You must have Lost Eden Expansion to use the pistol once modified beyond this point! ------------------------------ Ingredients ------------------------------ #L "Dust Brigade Solar Notum Infuser" "274558" ------------------------------ Recipe ------------------------------ Dust Brigade Solar Notum Infuser + Solar-Powered Master Engineer Pistol = #L "Infused Solar-Powered Master Engineer Pistol" "274557" Skills: | 1000WS,1800ME,1800EE | ------------------------------ Step 9: Augmented Master Engineer Pistol ------------------------------ Ingredients ------------------------------ #L "Crude Upgrade Kit" "274975" ------------------------------ Recipe ------------------------------ Infused Solar-Powered Master Engineer Pistol + Crude Upgrade Kit = #L "Augmented Master Engineer Pistol" "274973" Skills: | 1500WS,2100ME,2100EE | ------------------------------ Comments ------------------------------ The engineers best friend (besides his pet robots and his screwdriver) now has an extra 2 steps of upgrading for those high level engis with Lost Eden Expansions.
